sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor qunosity products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 于是多量浙江一带产的劣质产品起初进入市场。

sentences.english: A bad padlock invites a picklock.
sentences.chinese: 一个劣质的挂锁引发一个撬锁者。

sentences.english: The room reeked of cheap perfume.
sentences.chinese: 房间里弥漫着劣质香水的呛鼻气味。

sentences.english: There was a smell of cheap soap and of ancient hair-oil in the room.
sentences.chinese: 房间里有一股劣质肥皂和陈旧发油的气味。

sentences.english: So a lot of Zhejiang and produced poor quality products enter the market.
sentences.chinese: 于是多量浙江一带产的劣质产品首进步前辈入市场。

sentences.english: We’d like you to replace all of the inferior products.
sentences.chinese: 希望你们能将所有的劣质品替换掉。

sentences.english: She swore by her inferior sherry to me.
sentences.chinese: 她极力向我推荐她的劣质雪利酒。

sentences.english: The ladies smelling of poor perfume are accompanying them.
sentences.chinese: 却让那些满身劣质香水味的女娃作陪？

sentences.english: With the outer packing box is not qualified intricately worked leather or other material to inferior.
sentences.chinese: 外包装盒用的是不合格的劣质皮纸或其他材质。

sentences.english: We agree to compensate you for the detective watches by 5% of the total value.
sentences.chinese: 我方同意赔偿贵方总价值的5%来补偿劣质手表。

sentences.english: Analyzes the inferior milk power incident, which is exposed by news media recently.
sentences.chinese: 对最近新闻媒体曝光的劣质奶粉事件进行了剖析。

sentences.english: A bad shearer never had a good sickle.
sentences.chinese: 劣质的剪切机没有好的刀片。

sentences.english: The odor of cheap perfume is penetrating.
sentences.chinese: 劣质香水的味道太冲了。

sentences.english: A 20-litre jerrycan of poor quality water has quadrupled in price.
sentences.chinese: 一瓶20升的劣质水的价格已经涨了四倍。

sentences.english: What if they think my present is chintzy?
sentences.chinese: 如果她们认为我的礼物低价劣质怎么办？

sentences.english: Low-quality work generates inferior results and often has to be redone.
sentences.chinese: 工作质量低便产生劣质结果，接着往往就要从新做起。

definition: to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to skimp on the job and stint on materials (idiom)/jerry-building/sloppy work
to degenerate/to deteriorate/(of food) to go bad/to go off/(geology) metamorphism
to pass off fish eyes for pearls/to pass off fake products as genuine (idiom)
to mix in fake material/to adulterate
